levels.description:
Passive: When the sandbeast retreats, recover all bullets that hit in the area
Automatic: Attack Range <@ba.vup>increases</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, sandbeast redeployment time <@ba.vup>{respawn_time:0%}</>
<@ba.rem>Unlimited duration</>
